text: Any considerations for those of us that still use FTP for file manager assets? Especially for the case of site migrations (either WordPress to HubSpot or HubSpot to HubSpot) being able to quickly download and upload files while maintaining folder structure saves a ton of time. Will File Manager access be added to the CLI?

filemanager Upload is already in the CLI :slightly_smiling_face:

Downloading currently is not, in the mean time though you can bulk download files in the file manager UI. It exports a zip with your selections, or if you want everything at once you can do that too.

*TL;DR CRM Search API Rate Limit Increase*
Based on some recent feedback, we’re taking a tiered approach and increasing the rate limit for the the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search|CRM Search API>. This is a big win for developers! Changes like this are part of our ongoing effort to create the next generation of HubSpot's APIs and improve developer experience.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/crm-search-api-rate-limit-increase>
